timeline.author: ottenhoff

replies.bodyText:
Oops! ;) Surprising how frequently these are used together, along with the PBJQ.
I ended up with this because I was originally testing just in the browser console and when I implemented it, it wasn't working without the ready, so just tossed that in there without updating to be consistent.
replies.author: jonespm

replies.bodyText: I also wanted to try to get the focus of the next tabindex'able object but I wasn't sure how to do that without directly getting the id, which is probably fine in this case. Putting the focus back to where it was seemed fine though and better than it was. I'm not sure why this is working as expected in LTI, something with the HTML layout?
